CustomField.description: When enabled, the Ghost Recorder logs page navigation and feature usage to ActivityLog__c for experience optimization analytics. Default is OFF to protect data storage in large orgs. A scheduled cleanup job purges records older than 90 days.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable activity logging to track how users navigate the app. Logs are purged after 90 days. Recommended for orgs with fewer than 500 active users.
CustomField.label: Enable Activity Logging
